shop.title: Shop

shop.loadError: Could not load products right now. Please try again soon.
shop.emptySubtitle: Come back later to spend your Kepcoins on new items.

kepcoinPage.streakFreezeText: Freezing automatically saves your streak if you miss a day and don't complete daily tasks.
kepcoinPage.purchaseFailed: Could not complete purchase. Please try again.

history.hint: Complete tasks and participate to earn or spend kepcoin.

howToEarn.title: How to Earn Kepcoin
howToEarn.description: To earn this currency, you need to contribute to the development of the system. For example, kepcoin:
howToEarn.item3: For being the winner in daily, weekly, and monthly challenge ratings
howToEarn.item6: For helping in editing problems (writing solutions, translation, adding tags, finding similar problems)

howToSpend.title: How to Spend Kepcoin
howToSpend.item2: View a test with a failed solution
howToSpend.item8: Double rating change in contest (even if negative, it doubles)
howToSpend.item9: Maintain rating in contest (not given if negative)
